competitors.name: Oracle PeopleSoft
competitors.notes: Legacy on-premise HCM system; Workday founders were former PeopleSoft executives

competitors.name: SAP HR
competitors.notes: Dominant enterprise HR/ERP system in 2005, primarily on-premise

competitors.name: ADP
competitors.notes: Established payroll and HR outsourcing provider

competitors.name: Lawson Software
competitors.notes: HR and financial management software provider

competitors.name: Ultimate Software
competitors.notes: Cloud-based HR and payroll provider (now part of UKG)

context: Workday was founded in 2005 by Dave Duffield and Aneel Bhusri, former PeopleSoft executives, to create a modern, cloud-based alternative to legacy on-premise ERP systems. The HCM market was dominated by on-premise solutions like Oracle PeopleSoft and SAP.
